features: Balanced Audio cables utilize impedance balanced lines that reduce EM and RF noise.
Balanced cables have a separate braided Shield to provide additional resistance to interference without modulating the interference into the signal. |Prevents ground loop issues.
Xlr Male to female cables continue our tradition of bringing the highest quality cables at the best prices.
These cables feature thick, heavy gauge wires, gold Plated connectors and sturdy connector housings.
body.description: Monoprice line of professional audio cables brings you high performance Cables at rock bottom prices. Whether you're connecting broadcast equipment instruments for your band or your High end entertainment system Monoprice has the interconnect cables for you.. Balanced audio cables utilize impedance balanced lines that reduce EM and RF noise and extend the effective range of the cable run. Additionally unlike standard unbalanced RCA interconnects that utilizes their braid as a signal Return balanced cables have a separate braided shield to provide additional resistance to interference without modulating the interference into the signal. This prevents ground loop issues. Our XLR male to female cables continue our tradition of bringing the highest quality cables at the best prices. These cables feature thick heavy gauge wires gold Plated connectors and sturdy connector housings.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 1, 2024
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Looks great and works even better!
reviews.reviewText: This cable was perfect for my setup. I dont really have anything bad to say about it! Great quality at a great price!

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 20, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Top notch cable
reviews.reviewText: It's very rare that I take the time time to right a review, however, I was so surprised by the quality of this cable, that I was compelled to do so. I've been involved in live music for 30 years and this is one of the best cables I've ever seen. Cable diameter is thicker than any mic cable I can remember seeing and the connectors look top quality. I'm using this cable to run from my DI on my pedal board to my PA and the sound quality is noticeably better than the cable it replaced. If you are wondering about this cable, put your worries to rest.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on August 11, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Super High quality ....must for audiophiles
reviews.reviewText: I have been using the Monoprice XLR Male to XLR Female Cable for my Dj setup - with my Numark Mixstream Pro Go and Electro Voice Everse 8 and I must say that I am impressed with the quality of sound that it produces. The cable is well made and durable. The gold plating ensures that there is no loss of signal quality. The cable is also very flexible which makes it easy to work with. I would definitely recommend this cable to anyone who is looking for a high-quality cable at an affordable price must buy for audiophiles!!!!Will be buying more fore my goxlr

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on December 31, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars So far, I'm a fan of their products with the cheap sounding name.
reviews.reviewText: These Monoprice cables are well made, esp. for the money.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 21, 2022
reviews.reviewTitle: 4.0 out of 5 stars Some misalignment of the male pins in one of the two cables I purchased.
reviews.reviewText: I have typically use GLS XLR cables in the past but I just added an SVS PB4000 subwoofer to my system and thought I'd try these from Monoprice since their amps are an outstanding value for the money and I wanted to make sure really get my money's worth from the PB4000. When I took the cables out of the package my initial reaction was great. They appeared to be very well made and the quality of the materials appeared superior to the GLS cables I've been using. However, when I went to plug in the male pin end, it wouldn't fit, which seemed very usual, as they usually slide in with minimal resistance. I thought maybe I just needed to take a closer look, that my visual alignment was off. It wasn't. When I looked into the end of the cable the pins were obviously misaligned with the outer ring. I was able to bend them into position when the cable seems to work fine, but I'd have to say that was disappointing to see and not what I expected at all from a brand with great reputation that I've had great experience with the past. The other cable was fine. I may have just received a one in a million quality control miss, but none the less, it happened. Again, the cable ended performing well after I bent the pins back into alignment and I'd still rate them a great value and they are built of good quality materials. The lack of quality control just threw me a bit.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on February 10, 2024
reviews.reviewText: probably the best XLR cable for the price.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on July 22, 2023
reviews.reviewTitle: 5.0 out of 5 stars Monoprice has some great products
reviews.reviewText: I've been purchasing items from Monoprice for roughly 12 years now. Affordable. Great quality. Simple. Granted there could be some items that are as awesome, but for this review, the XLR cable was exactly what I needed. Looks good and feels good. Works as described.

reviews.reviewDate: Reviewed in the United States on October 24, 2023
reviews.reviewText: Works great patching my mixing board into an EQ and then to my Amp

Esse cabo foi muito bem construido, não tem problema de mal contato, o ruído não existe, o único som que ouvi foi de ambiente, mas isso é só ajeitar na Pre-Amp da sua interface de áudio ou mesa de som.Eu só tenho elogios pra dar, eu enrosquei no braço do microfone, e está bem fixo, ele não entorta, só alegria.Em questão de preço eu prefiro esse pois o design dele passa mais confiança, então compensa.Para quem quer um áudio limpo e gostoso de ouvir, esse cabo XLR faz tudo.

reviews.reviewTitle: Estos no son buenos cables, ¡son excelentes!
reviews.reviewText: Estoy absolutamente impresionado con el Cable XLR macho a XLR hembra 16 AWG. Desde el momento en que los conecté, supe que había dado con un producto de alta calidad que realmente marca la diferencia en mi configuración de audio.La construcción robusta de estos cables es evidente a primera vista. No hay espacio para preocupaciones sobre posibles daños o rupturas, ya que estos cables están diseñados para durar. La funda protectora no solo brinda una sensación de durabilidad, sino que también ayuda a prevenir enredos y enmarañamientos molestos.La calidad de audio que experimento con estos cables es simplemente excepcional. La transmisión de señal es clara y nítida, sin ruidos ni interferencias molestas. Esto es crucial para mí, ya que trabajo en la industria del entretenimiento en vivo, donde la calidad del sonido es primordial. Estos cables han demostrado ser dignos de confianza en todas las situaciones, desde presentaciones en vivo hasta sesiones de grabación en el estudio.La elección del calibre 16 AWG es acertada. El grosor de los cables contribuye a una mejor conductividad y menor pérdida de señal. Esto se traduce en un audio más rico y detallado en cada performance. También me encanta la longitud de estos cables, que me da la flexibilidad de moverme sin restricciones en el escenario o en el estudio.La conexión XLR macho a XLR hembra es sólida y segura, lo que me brinda tranquilidad durante mis actuaciones en vivo. No tengo que preocuparme por desconexiones accidentales o interrupciones inoportunas. La confiabilidad de estos cables es una de las razones por las que los considero una inversión valiosa en mi equipo de audio.En resumen, el Cable XLR macho a XLR hembra 16 AWG ha superado todas mis expectativas. La calidad de construcción, la transmisión de señal impecable y la confiabilidad general hacen que estos cables sean una opción superior para cualquier músico, ingeniero de sonido o entusiasta del audio. Si estás buscando llevar tu experiencia auditiva al siguiente nivel, no busques más. Estos cables son la elección perfecta para lograr un sonido excepcional en cada actuación.

Yeah, you could pay more for an expensive "super-premium" brand of XLR cable, or spend a few hours with wire strippers, a soldering iron & a polarity tester to make your own, but really, why?I've been using Monoprice cables for years, the quality is top-notch -- the XLR's always make solid, secure connections and I've never had an issue with interference on the cable.5 stars all the way.

Los utilizo para Ami equipo de sonido profesional dj, tengo ya un año con ellos, son muy resistentes, lo mejor es que son y se ven de calidad, justo lo que busco en mi sistema, que no solo se escuche profesional sino que luzca profesional, estos cables lo sonsicuen con una excelente relación calidad/precio

reviews.reviewTitle: Good quality - does the job while looking and feeling nice
reviews.reviewText: The cable has a nice feel and flexibility, seems to be of a reasonable build quality, and as far as I can tell delivers the acoustic signal transparently as it should.
